data.title: CDFW, SWRCB, and CalCannabis to Host Three Additional Cannabis Cultivation Permitting Enrollment Workshops
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
data.excerpt: State Water Resource Control Boards (SWRCB), California Department of Fish and Wildlife (CDFW), and the California Department of Food and Agriculture’s CalCannabis Cultivation Licensing division (CalCannabis) will be hosting three Cannabis Cultivation Permitting Enrollment workshops on December 4-6 from 10:00 a.m. to 3:00 p.m. The workshop locations are as follows:  Tuesday, December 4: 73-710 Fred Waring […]
tags: California department of fish and wildlife
